/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a canopy of greenery and architecture. Cars and bicycles are parked along the sides of the street, hinting at the daily life and movement in the city. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. The image is slightly blurred, adding a sense of motion and dynamism to the scene.
